    • The process you must follow while learning to program

    Here I present a good overview of how I got out of the learn learn learn trap novice programmers face. I started early on in my life wishing the next big thing when I didn't know how to lay a brick. I share the tips I should have been given when I was in the dreaming ages. Thankfully I picked up on what I did wrong and this article is a quick non-direct illustration of my ideology.
